docs.title: API
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for the Dataset Recommendation Service.

docs.title: GET /dataset-recsys/recommend
docs.text:
Get recommendations

Description

Retrieve the top-N recommendations for a given item in a dataset.

The meaning of item varies by dataset: - MathE — items are educational materials (PDFs), whose identifiers correspond to filenames with .pdf extension (e.g., {item_id}.pdf).

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description dataset query string No The dataset/application name iid query string No The item identifier within the selected dataset n query integer 10 No Number of similar items to return

Response 200 OK

application/json 
{
    "dataset": "mathe",
    "iid": "56.pdf",
    "recommendations": [
        "54.pdf",
        "55.pdf",
        "52.pdf",
        "367.pdf",
        "360.pdf"
    ]
}
Schema of the response body 
{
    "properties": {
        "dataset": {
            "type": "string",
            "title": "Dataset",
            "description": "The dataset/application name"
        },
        "iid": {
            "type": "string",
            "title": "Iid",
            "description": "The item identifier within the selected dataset"
        },
        "recommendations": {
            "items": {
                "type": "string"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "title": "Recommendations",
            "description": "List of recommended item identifiers"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "required": [
        "dataset",
        "iid",
        "recommendations"
    ],
    "title": "ItemToItemRecsResponse"
}

Response 404 Not Found

application/json 
{
    "errors": [
        {
            "code": 404,
            "detail": "Dataset 'movies' not found"
        }
    ]
}

{
    "errors": [
        {
            "code": 404,
            "detail": "Item ID '666.pdf' not found in dataset 'mathe'"
        }
    ]
}
Schema of the response body

Response 422 Unprocessable Content

application/json 
{
    "errors": [
        {
            "code": 422,
            "detail": [
                {
                    "type": "missing",
                    "loc": [
                        "query",
                        "iid"
                    ],
                    "msg": "Field required"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "errors": [
        {
            "code": 422,
            "detail": [
                {
                    "type": "int_parsing",
                    "loc": [
                        "query",
                        "n"
                    ],
                    "msg": "Input should be a valid integer, unable to parse string as an integer",
                    "input": "ten"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "errors": [
        {
            "code": 422,
            "detail": [
                {
                    "type": "less_than_equal",
                    "loc": [
                        "query",
                        "n"
                    ],
                    "msg": "Input should be less than or equal to 20",
                    "input": "21",
                    "ctx": {
                        "le": 20
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
Schema of the response body

docs.title: GET /dataset-recsys/health
docs.text:
Health check

Description

Check if the recommender API is running and responsive.

Response 200 OK

application/json Schema of the response body

docs.title: GET /dataset-recsys/
docs.text:
Root endpoint

Description

Root endpoint to verify that the service is running.

Response 200 OK

application/json Schema of the response body

docs.title: Third-Party Licenses
docs.text: The Dataset Recommendation Service uses several third-party libraries, each with its own license. The major dependencies and their licenses are listed below:

docs.title: Citing Dataset Recommendation Service
docs.text:
If you use the Dataset Recommendation Service in your research, please cite it as follows:

DataGEMS EOSC. (2023). Dataset Recommendation. GitHub. https://github.com/datagems-eosc/dataset-recsys

BibTeX:

@software{dataset_recsys,
  author = {{DataGEMS EOSC}},
  title = {Dataset Recommendation},
  year = {2023},
  publisher = {GitHub},
  url = {https://github.com/datagems-eosc/dataset-recsys}
}
